description:
This is an introductory course on China’s Capital Markets that will examine China’s listed equity, private equity, bond and derivative markets from
a development perspective and its convergence towards international standards. The course will use a combination of cases, professional and
academic articles to provide an understanding of the concepts, issues and investors involved in China’s capital markets. An underlying theme of this course is how China’s capital markets have developed and improved, despite the grievances and misgivings widely espoused by the investment community.
title: Selected Topics in Finance: China’s Capital Markets
